descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding or ability to identify any health care providers for reproductive and sexual health services.
The student identifies only one or two health care providers, but the information provided is inaccurate or incomplete.
The student identifies some health care providers (3-4), but the information provided contains inaccuracies or lacks detail.
The student identifies several health care providers (5-6), but the information may lack some detail or have minor inaccuracies.
The student accurately identifies most health care providers (7-8) with sufficient detail and minimal inaccuracies.
The student accurately and comprehensively identifies a wide range of health care providers (9+) for reproductive and sexual health services with detailed information.
The student shows no understanding of the services provided by reproductive and sexual health care providers.
The student demonstrates a very limited understanding of the services provided.
The student demonstrates a basic understanding of some of the services offered.
The student demonstrates a general understanding of most of the services offered by the identified providers.
The student demonstrates a clear understanding of the key services offered and can differentiate between providers.
The student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the range of services provided and can explain how different providers meet specific needs.
The student shows no awareness of how to access reproductive and sexual health services.
The student has minimal awareness of accessibility and available resources.
The student identifies one or two ways to access services or resources, but lacks detail.
The student identifies several ways to access services and resources, but the information may be incomplete.
The student identifies multiple ways to access services and resources with reasonable detail.
The student demonstrates a thorough understanding of accessibility, available resources, and how to navigate the health care system for reproductive and sexual health services.
